statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); git_branch=''; git_status=''; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); ahead=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-list --count @{u}..HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo '0'); behind=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-list --count HEAD..@{u} 2>/dev/null || echo '0'); dirty=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); staged=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --cached --name-only 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); stashed=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks stash list 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); indicators=''; [[ "$dirty" != "0" ]] && indicators="${indicators}*${dirty}"; [[ "$staged" != "0" ]] && indicators="${indicators}+${staged}"; [[ "$ahead" != "0" ]] && indicators="${indicators}â†‘${ahead}"; [[ "$behind" != "0" ]] && indicators="${indicators}â†“${behind}"; [[ "$stashed" != "0" ]] && indicators="${indicators}âš‘${stashed}"; [[ -z "$indicators" ]] && indicators='âœ“'; git_branch=" $(printf '\033[36m')($branch)$(printf '\033[0m')"; git_status=" $(printf '\033[33m')$indicators$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; conda_env=''; if [[ -n "$CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV" && "$CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV" != "base" ]]; then conda_env=" $(printf '\033[32m')ðŸ$CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; node_version=''; if command -v node > /dev/null 2>&1; then node_version=" $(printf '\033[32m')â¬¢$(node --version | sed 's/v//')$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; output="$(printf '\033[34m')$dir$(printf '\033[0m')$git_branch$git_status$conda_env$node_version $(printf '\033[35m')$model$(printf '\033[0m')"; [[ "$style" != "null" && "$style" != "default" ]] && output="$output $(printf '\033[90m')[$style]$(printf '\033[0m')"; echo "$output"
